QuestData.Title: The Worldbreaker
QuestData.Description: There's no time! Deathwing struck before we could form against him. If you do not stop him, the Earthen Ring will end this day!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: You are the only one left who can stand against the Worldbreaker. If you fail, all of Azeroth is doomed.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Nightmares threaten to swarm and consume all within Iso'noth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Deathwing, the Aspect of Death.
QuestData.RewardText: You're awake! Thank the elements. I'd almost lost all hope.
